vote.thanks_for_participate_on_this_AGM: Thanks for participate on this voting process, back to home to review and follow all the live results
vote.the_first_row_of_the_spreadsheet_will_be: The first row of the spreadsheet will be used as the name of the fields that voters will be prompted for. Accents, spaces and capital letters will not be taken into account. Therefore John Díaz can also be accessed by typing JOHN DIAZ.

vote.this_is_the_form_that_your_community_wil: This is the form that your community will need to fill in order to vote

vote.title: Title
vote.we_are_using_a_decentralized_secure_syst: We are sending all the information to the blockchain. This action may take a few minutes, please be patient.
